>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v1/chat/message/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Add a new message by Id

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"id","required":true,"description":"Id of the object, this can be a mongo Id but also a plain string (backwards-compatibility).","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"message":{"description":"Message","type":"string"},"channel":{"description":"Id of the channel this message should go to","type":"string"},"writer":{"description":"Id of the member that wrote this message","type":"string"},"writtenAt":{"description":"Milliseconds since epoch for this timestamp/date","type":"integer"},"replyTo":{"description":"Message Id this message is in reply to","type":"string"}},"title":"chatMessagePost"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"text/csv":{"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"\"67d63acba3e170d9b68cb7f9\""}}},"404":{"description":"NOT FOUND"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
